definition: class/rank/grade/equal to/same as/to wait for/to await/et cetera/and so on/et al. (and other authors)/after/as soon as/once

sentences.english: Under certain situation the equivalence of open set condition and strong open set condition are discussed in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 文章讨论开集条件与强开集条件是否等价的问题。

sentences.english: Smaller sizes may be manufactured from equivalent bar stock specifications.
sentences.chinese: 小通径阀门可能采用等价的棒材材料进行制造。

sentences.english: Ricardian Equivalence Rule is an important factor which is used to evaluate fiscal deficit effect.
sentences.chinese: 李嘉图等价定理是评价财政赤字效果的重要因素之一。

sentences.english: The equivalence relation is the basic Concept of the rough set theory.
sentences.chinese: 等价关系是粗集理论中的一个重要概念。

sentences.english: This is the cultural equivalent of rust.
sentences.chinese: 这就是在文化上等价于铁锈的东西。

sentences.english: Its dual establishes the equivalence of prime filters and ultrafilters.
sentences.chinese: 它的对偶建立了素滤子和超滤子的等价性。

sentences.english: The optimizer is equivalent in function to an expert system.
sentences.chinese: 优化器在功能上等价于一个专家系统。

sentences.english: This is equivalent to an angular distribution of constituent plane waves.
sentences.chinese: 这等价于各种成分的平面波的角分布。

sentences.english: A capacitor is the electrical equivalent of the bucket.
sentences.chinese: 电容器就是吊桶的电子等价物。

sentences.english: If you double-click the existing equivalence class, you can rename it.
sentences.chinese: 如果您双击已经存在的等价类，您可以重命名它。

sentences.english: In view of network structure, FCP is equivalent to the radial basis function network.
sentences.chinese: 在结构上，FCP网络同径向基函数网络是等价的。

sentences.english: A datapool must contain one equivalence class.
sentences.chinese: 一个数据池必须包含一个等价类。

sentences.english: In a word , we can get all the generators of power integral bases under equivalent.
sentences.chinese: 从而在等价的意义下找到了所有的幂元整基。

sentences.english: First, some properties of equivalency of default theories are proposed.
sentences.chinese: 首先，得到了若干关于缺省理论等价的性质。

sentences.english: You can always convert a nested query into an equivalent join.
sentences.chinese: 您始终可以将嵌套查询转换成等价的连接。

sentences.english: Numerical simulation shows the effectiveness of the recovery of the senor faults using the concept of equivalent control.
sentences.chinese: 仿真结果表明等价控制能够较好地重传感器故障。

definition: real-valued (math.)/taking real numbers as values (of a function)
field of complex numbers (math.), usually denoted by C
